reapack.name: TormyVanCool_AudioBooks_ChapterMarker.lua
reapack.desc: AUDIOBOOKS: CHAPTER MARKER. It Adds/Edits 'CHAP=' markers for Audiobooks, adding a SideCar.TXT file

version.author: Tormy Van Cool
version.changelog: Changed marker format into: CHAP=chapter_title. The SideCar.txt file, reports now in this way: seconds_from_the_beginning_of_the_file,1,"chapter_title" The ',1,' is added for compatibility with certain radio automation softwares, not capable to fully read MP3s

reapack.name: TormyVanCool_AudioBooks_ChapterMarkerUpdater.lua
reapack.desc: AUDIOBOOKS: UPDATER' position when moved on the time line, on the SideCar.txt file

reapack.name: TormyVanCool_Tempo_Markers_to_CSV.lua
reapack.desc: TEMPO MARKERS to CSV: exports the tempo markers to CSV file located into the project's directory

reapack.name: TormyVanCool_Import_Tempo_Markers.lua
reapack.desc: IMPORT TEMPO MARKERS: it reads the file Tempo_Markers.csv if present, and imports the Tempo Markers into the project.

reapack.name: TormyVanCool_Podcasts_Songs.lua
reapack.desc: PODCASTS: PODCASTS SONGS. It adds region with songs metadata, for Podcasts and Pre-Recorded Broadcasts

metadata.description: {\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang2057{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 Arial;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Calibri;}{\f2\fnil\fcharset2 Symbol;}} {\colortbl ;\red255\green0\blue0;} {\*\generator Msftedit 5.41.21.2510;}\viewkind4\uc1\pard\sa200\sl276\slmult1\qj\lang9\b\fs24 Activating \b0 or \b Arming \b0 this script, by clicking on the item containing a song, a region will be created and a pop-up will ask for:\par \pard{\pntext\f2\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf2\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}\fi-360\li720\sl276\slmult1\qj \b Song title:\b0 (\cf1\b mandatory field\cf0\b0 )\par {\pntext\f2\'B7\tab} \b Performer: \b0 (\cf1\b mandatory field\cf0\b0 )\par \pard\sa200\sl276\slmult1\qj \par Once clicked on OK, the duration of the song is automatically calculated in seconds. A region will be created with the following coded name:\par \pard\sa200\sl276\slmult1 CHAP=\i offset\i0 |\i given_title\i0 |\i given_performer\i0 |\i production_year\i0 |\i Label\i0 |\i duration_in_seconds\i0\par \pard\sa200\sl276\slmult1\qj\par \pard\sa200\sl276\slmult1 At the same time, a SideCar file is created into the directory of the project, where the file \b .RPP\b0 is placed, with the same name of the project, and TXT extension:\par \pard\sl276\slmult1\qc\par PROJECT_NAME.txt\par \pard\sl276\slmult1 Each line is a record, so structured\par \par \pard\sl276\slmult1\qc\i Offset\i0 ,\i MidStream_Tag\i0 ,"\i Song_Performer\i0 - \i Song_Title\i0 - \i Production_Year\i0 - \i Label\i0 - \i Duration mm:ss\i0"\par \par \pard\sl276\slmult1\i Offset \i0 = AUTOMATIC by SYSTEM: Seconds from the begining of the file, where the song starts\par \i MidStream_Tag \i0 = AUTOMATIC by SYSTEM: 1 (in signifies: text string)\par \i Song_Performer \i0 = MANDATORY: the given song performer\par \i Song_Title \i0 = MANDATORY: the given song title\par \i Production_Year \i0 = OPTIONAL: The productionyear in 4 digits taken from Discogs or MusicBrainz if possible, or just NULL\par \i Label \i0 = OPTIONAL: The label for that specific release taken from Discogs or MusicBrainz if possible, or just NULL\par \i Duration seconds \i0 = AUTOMATIC by SYSTEM: Duration in mm:ss automatically calculated. It states how long the song is broadcasted \par \par \b Versioning:\b0\par \par On purpose, are not available versions previous the present one.\par You can alwasy open the file and read what I did in the pervious versions. It's reported into the header.\par }

reapack.name: TormyVanCool_Podcasts_Auto_GetMetaData.lua
reapack.desc: PODCASTS AUTO GET METADATA: Automatically retrieve the metadata from the Source File and it adds region with songs metadata, for Podcasts and Pre-Recorded Broadcasts

metadata.description:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\nouicompat\deflang2057{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 Arial;}} {\*\generator Riched20 10.0.22000}\viewkind4\uc1 \pard\sa200\sl276\slmult1\qj\b\fs24\lang9 Activating \b0 or \b Arming \b0 this script, by clicking on the item containing a song, a region will be created getting the MetaData from the Source Audio File:\par A region will be created with the following coded name:\par
\pard\sa200\sl276\slmult1 CHAP=\i offset\i0 |\i given_title\i0 |\i given_performer\i0 |\i production_year\i0 |\i Label\i0 |\i duration_in_seconds\i0\par At the same time, a SideCar file is created into the directory of the project, where the file \b .RPP\b0 is placed, with the same name of the project, and TXT extension:\par
\pard\sl276\slmult1\qc \par PROJECT_NAME.txt\par
\pard\sl276\slmult1 Each line is a record, so structured\par \par \i Offset\i0 ,\i MidStream_Tag\i0 ,"\i Song_Performer\i0 - \i Song_Title\i0 - \i Production_Year\i0 - \i Label\i0 - \i Duration mm:ss\i0 "\par \par \i Offset \i0 = AUTOMATIC by SYSTEM: Seconds from the begining of the file, where the song starts\par \i MidStream_Tag \i0 = AUTOMATIC by SYSTEM: 1 (in signifies: text string)\par \i Song_Performer \i0 = MANDATORY: the given song performer\par \i Song_Title \i0 = MANDATORY: the given song title\par \i Production_Year \i0 = OPTIONAL: The productionyear in 4 digits taken from Discogs or MusicBrainz if possible, or just NULL\par \i Label \i0 = OPTIONAL: The label for that specific release taken from Discogs or MusicBrainz if possible, or just NULL\par \i Duration seconds \i0 = AUTOMATIC by SYSTEM: Duration in mm:ss automatically calculated. It states how long the song is broadcasted \par \par \b Versioning:\b0\par \par On purpose, are not available versions previous the present one.\par You can always open the file and read what I did in the pervious versions. It's reported into the header.\par }

reapack.name: TormyVanCool_Podcasts_Segmentation_FinalMarker.lua
reapack.desc: PODCASTS: SEGMENTATION MARKERS and FINAL TAIL. It adds region with songs metadata, for Podcasts and Pre-Recorded Broadcasts

metadata.description:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\nouicompat\deflang1033{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 Calibri;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset2 Symbol;}} {\*\generator Riched20 10.0.19041}\viewkind4\uc1 \pard\sl240\slmult1\f0\fs22\lang9 PODCATS SEGMENTATION FINAL MARKER script, enables you to split your podcast in several parts.\par \par Some seconds before the end of each part, at your taste, you enter the marker with a write like\par
\pard{\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf1\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}\fi-360\li720\sl240\slmult1 "Continues" or\par {\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}"See you" or\par {\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}"And Part-x", wher "x" can be 1 or 2 or 3 etc, or\par {\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}"Stay tuned" etc\par
\pard\sl240\slmult1\par
\pard\sl240\slmult1 The total length of the phrase shoudn't be more than 20 characters.\par
\pard\sa200\sl276\slmult1\par }

reapack.name: TormyVanCool_Podcasts_Updater.lua
reapack.desc: PODCASTS: UPDATER. It updates imported songs from library with only 1 click. Wathc tutorial on YT to understand how to use it

reapack.name: TormyVanCool_Songs_Library.lua
reapack.desc: SONGS LIBRARY: Assign basics song data to the region

metadata.description: {\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\nouicompat\deflang1033{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 Calibri;}} {\colortbl ;\red255\green0\blue0;} {\*\generator Riched20 10.0.22000}\viewkind4\uc1 \pard\sa200\sl276\slmult1\f0\fs22\lang9\par It assigns Performer, Title, Year Production and Label to a region.\par Exporting the file name as $region, it put in sequence the fields as\par \par \cf1 performer_title_yearProduction_LabelCopyright_Duration\cf0\par \par it can be used with \b mp3tag\b0 to assign from "\i filename to tag\i0 "\par \b %artist%_%title%_%year%_%copyright%_%length%\par \b0 In bulk\par }

version.author: Tormy Van Cool
version.changelog: v1.0 (21 may 2022) + Initial release v1.1 (22 may 2022) - NA + UNKNOWN v1.2 (22 may 2022) - upper + normal v1.3 (03 october 2022) + Forbidden characters list + Forbidden characters: /, \ + version + by

reapack.name: TormyVanCool_ExportStems.lua
reapack.desc: STEMS: EXPORT STEMS. Prepares stems to be exported for the real length of each track.

metadata.description: {\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang2057{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 Calibri;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset2 Symbol;}} {\*\generator Msftedit 5.41.21.2510;}\viewkind4\uc1\pard\sa200\sl276\slmult1\lang9\b\f0\fs22 EXPORT STEMS\b0 Performs the following actions:\par \pard{\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf1\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}\fi-360\li720\sl276\slmult1 Gets the cursor position\par {\pntext\f1\'B7\tab} Selects all tracks\par {\pntext\f1\'B7\tab} Insert empty item\par {\pntext\f1\'B7\tab} Glue all items on all tracks\par {\pntext\f1\'B7\tab} Calls the rendering window\par {\pntext\f1\'B7\tab} Unslects all tracks\par {\pntext\f1\'B7\tab} Selects all items for stems\par {\pntext\f1\'B7\tab} Calls the rendering window\par \pard\sl276\slmult1\par Once exported, each track has a duration form the begining of the song\par to the end of the track itself, not to the very end of the song.\par This saves HD space, making shorter files\par }

reapack.name: TormyVanCool_YOUTUBE_Downloader.lua
reapack.desc: UTILITY: Downloads videos from YouTUBE, VIMEO, PATREON and others, and imports them into the project

version.author: Tormy Van Cool

reapack.name: TormyVanCool_Program_Runner.lua
reapack.desc: UTILITY: PROGRAM RUNNER. It creates scripts that launch any external program you select with just 1 click, automatically adding it to the Action List, ready to be used!

reapack.name: TormyVanCool_ExportData.lua
reapack.desc: UTILITY: EXPORT PROJECT DATA. It exports project data in CSV and HTML formats and TEMPO MARKERS in All formats included TXT

metadata.description: {\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang2057{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 Calibri;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset2 Symbol;}} {\*\generator Msftedit 5.41.21.2510;}\viewkind4\uc1\pard\sa200\sl276\slmult1\lang9\b\f0\fs28 EXPORT DATA \b0 collects all tracks with FX and creates a pair of files: CSV and HTML format, listing all tracks with FX, the FX list for each track, and their status.\par NOTES are also exported: \i project notes\i0 , as well as \i track notes\i0 and \i item notes\i0 .\par The content is dived in 5 main tables, on HTML file:\par \pard{\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf1\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}\fi-360\li720\sa200\sl276\slmult1\b PROJECT DATA\b0\line It contains basic data of the project as:\line Project name and sample rate\line Total tracks\line DAW Employed\line Author\line Notes\par \b{\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}EFFECTED TRACKS\b0\line TRACK\line\pard{\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf1\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}\fi-360\li1080\sa200\sl276\slmult1 Track IDX\line Name\line Type (Folder or Track)\line Notes\line\pard{\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf1\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}\fi-360\li720\sa200\sl276\slmult1 STATUS\line\pard{\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf1\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}\fi-360\li1080\sa200\sl276\slmult1 N.Item on that track\line Solo\line Mute\line\pard{\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf1\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}\fi-360\li720\sa200\sl276\slmult1 FX\line\pard{\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf1\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}\fi-360\li1080\sa200\sl276\slmult1 FX Name\line Enabled/Bypassed\line OnLine/OffLine\line Plugin File\par \pard{\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf1\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}\fi-360\li720\sa200\sl276\slmult1\b NOTED TRACKS\b0\line TRACK\line\pard{\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf1\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}\fi-360\li1080\sa200\sl276\slmult1 IDX\line Name\line Type (Folder or Track)\line Notes\line\pard{\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf1\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}\fi-360\li720\sa200\sl276\slmult1 STATUS\line\pard{\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf1\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}\fi-360\li1080\sa200\sl276\slmult1 N.Item on that track\line Solo\line\pard{\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf1\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}\fi-360\li1080\sa200\sl276\slmult1 Mute\par \pard{\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf1\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}\fi-360\li720\sa200\sl276\slmult1\b EFFECTED ITEMS\b0\line MAIN DATA\line\pard{\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf1\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}\fi-360\li1080\sa200\sl276\slmult1 Belonging to (Track Name)\line FX\line Position\line Length\line Notes\line\pard{\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf1\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}\fi-360\li720\sa200\sl276\slmult1 STATUS\line\pard{\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf1\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}\fi-360\li1080\sa200\sl276\slmult1 Mute\line Locked\line\pard{\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf1\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}\fi-360\li720\sa200\sl276\slmult1 SOURCE\line\pard{\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf1\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}\fi-360\li1080\sa200\sl276\slmult1 Source Name (and Location)\line Sample Rate\line Bit Depth\par \pard{\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf1\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}\fi-360\li720\sa200\sl276\slmult1\b NOTED ITEMS\b0\line\pard{\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf1\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}\fi-360\li720\sa200\sl276\slmult1 MAIN DATA\line\pard{\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf1\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}\fi-360\li1080\sa200\sl276\slmult1 Belonging to (Track Name)\line Position\line Length\line Notes\line\pard{\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf1\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}\fi-360\li720\sa200\sl276\slmult1 STATUS\line\pard{\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf1\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}\fi-360\li1080\sa200\sl276\slmult1 Mute\line Locked\line\pard{\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf1\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}\fi-360\li720\sa200\sl276\slmult1 SOURCE\line\pard{\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf1\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}\fi-360\li1080\sa200\sl276\slmult1 Source Name (and Location)\line Sample Rate\line\pard{\pntext\f1\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf1\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}\fi-360\li720\sa200\sl276\slmult1 Bit Depth\par \pard\sa200\sl276\slmult1\fs22\par }

version.author: Tormy Van Cool
version.changelog:
v1.0 (18 may 2021) + Initial release v1.0.1 (18 may 2021) + Added pop-up when files are saved v1.0.2 (18 may 2021) + Pup up if project is not saved v1.0.3 (18 may 2021) + Date to file names + Creation date into files + Version into files v1.0.4 (18 may 2021) + Project Notes + Track Notes + Project Sample Rate v2.0 (18 may 2021) + Expandable/Collapsible Tables + Odd/Even on Mute flag + Odd/Even on Solo flag + Only noted tracks - Pipe separated Values + Comma Separated Values + Effected items + Noted items v2.0.1 (18 may 2021) # Buf Fix: all FX where displayed as Disalbed v2.0.2 (18 may 2021) + FX Chain Status v2.1 (19 may 2021) + All Tracks Hierarchy + All tracks Statuses + Master Channel FX and Notes + Precision + Project Length HH:MM:SS v2.1.1 (19 may 2021) # Minor bug fixed: when no FX on Master, returned error on variable lineCSV because nil v2.1.2 (20 may 2021) # Tracks in the HIerarchy & Master Channel without FX have not FX Chain indication v2.2 (24 may 2021) # Optimized Code + VSTS' Path Detection + SUbfolder indication into FFEXed Tracks - Table width 90% + Table width 100% + Num. Items, Num. Markers, Num. Region in Project Data # Known issue 1: Paths of LV2 FXes are not detected or correctly detected. WORKS IN PROGRESS. # Known Issue 2: Paths of 32bit FXes are not detected or correctly detected. WORKS IN PROGRESS. v2.3 (26 may 2021) + Project Markers + Project Regions + Solo in Tracks Hierarchy + Mute in Tracks Hierarchy # Cosmetic changes on Project Data and Master Channel table # Minor issues on CSV format v2.3b # Mistyping correction v2.4 + Included jQuery base64 v2.5 + Project MetaData v2.6 + Song Title (due new fiels on ALT+ENTER) v2.7 + Collapsible MetaData Table v2.8 + Check if SWS is installed + Check the Reaper version + Path into the export box # Specified Noted Tracks only # Specified Noted Items only v2.9 # CSS adaptation
v2.9.1 # UTF-8 on HTML
v2.9.2 # HH:MM:SS:FF + Project Tempo BPM v2.9.3 + URL Encode for spaces + Rendered audio: Only Audio Formats v2.9.4 + Management UTF8 Characters on file names + Metadata: Wavext + Metadata: Aswg + Metadata: Cafinfo + Links to Documentation # Mistyping corrections v3.0 # Version of Reaper + Tempo Markers v3.1 + Error travp in case project is not finished + export CSV Headers v3.2 # Not rading BWF Originator Reference v3.3 + Remove cp.bat v3.4 (23 feb 2024) # Corrected file list for Mac v3.5 + Decoding of the wildcards @credits Mario Bianchi for his contribution to expedite the process; Edgemeal, Meo-Ada Mespotine for the help into extracting directories [t=253830]; Solger for his help on the color decode [t=253981] Spk77 for the part of the list to explore directories [p=1542391&postcount=3] Meo-Ada Mespotine for her suggestion to spot the REAPER.ini to find the correct rendering path [t=259455] MPL to give me the shortcut using SWS API isntead ot Reaper to extract the correct name from REAPER.ini [t=259455] Yanick & schwa to have given the easiest way to check the installation of SWS. Respectively [p=2495432&postcount=3] [p=1706951&postcount=7] Egor Skriptunoff for his precious help to convert special characters UTF8 [https://stackoverflow.com/questions/70170504/lua-how-to-correctly-read-uft8-file-names-and-path-with-accented-letters-and-um] Jack London to have highlighted the but on Mac system https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_VDGMuxJ5xc Alb Vedo (the_metal_priest) to have helped me to debug Mac https://www.facebook.com/groups/959114728148422/posts/1453458458714044/ FeedTheCat that have sugegsted the correct line code helping to solve the Mac issue https://forum.cockos.com/showthread.php?p=2761566#post2761566 Cfillion adn Sexan https://forum.cockos.com/showthread.php?p=2761711#post2761711 Schwa https://forum.cockos.com/showthread.php?t=282944

version.author: Tormy Van Cool
version.changelog: v1.0 (30 may 2021) + Initial release v1.1 (31 may 2021) + Save status of HTML File + Retrieve status of HTML file v1.2 (31 may 2021) + Saves files into Reaper's Folder + No more need internet connection v1.3 (31 may 2021) # Minor adjustments v1.3.1 (31 may 2021) # Slved a bug occurred with mac (what else!) v1.3.2 (31 may 2021) + Added info block at the end of the process v2.0 (1 june 2021) + AU detection on MAC v2.1 (1 june2021) + Helper with modal pop-up v2.2 (13 june 2021) PIXY - Import button + Automatic import JSON file if present + Hide checked button + Show checked button v2.3 (30 october 2021) # ameliorated columns # CSS glitch v2.4 (30 october 2021) + instr Column + Links v2.5 FERRETS (1 november 2021) + instr Column CSV v2.6 FERRETS (1 november 2021) # glitch on jQuery: Hide/Show button was not working any longer v2.7 FERRETS (1 june 2023) + CLAP # Corrected a bug that could list less plugins than the ones really installed v2.8 FERRETS (1 june 2023) # Fixed issue with Mac (both x86_64 and arch64) # Fixed issue with Linux + "CLAP Type" to CLAP files v2.8.5 # Fixed message "Not existing VST cache. Isntall at least 1 plugin!!!" v2.9 + CLAP File Name v3.0 FERRETS (05 August 2023) + Old 32bit VST List v3.1 FERRETS (19 August 2023) # Corrected bug: if no 64bit or not 32bit plugins where installed, an error was displayed. + Close file CLAP
